reviewText: Pavarotti & Friends 2 is a classical jam session with the best singer ever having a ball with a wonderful mixture of friends.

The video show an excellent performance by all the singers who joined Pavarotti.  Bryan Adams & Pavarotti made a perfect duet in 'O Sole Mio.  As in all "Pavarotti & Friends" videos you will also  contribute for the children of the war.  Highly recommended.
Enjoying much of the talents of those performing on this video, I wish all people of all ages would just listen and watch and I believe that they couldn't help but to love the music as I do.
